reviewText: There are a few spots in these discs where the picture is a little dark, or there's a skip here and there, but one must keep in mind how old these films are, and considering the technology they had when these were made, they remain highly enjoyable.

The movies on the DVD on good; not quality material as today's movies but they are enjoyable and sound is good; all are black and white; a couple of them are a bit grainy and you can see some of the film marks and on one it did skip; mind you, this was not a fault of the DVD but rather the movie itself; I bought this DVD because I use to go every Saturday to the local theater to see the Durango Kid and just watching them brings back many memories.  For the price of the DVD, you get a good bargain; at least that is my opinion.

This was a huge disappointment after paying $15.00 for a DVD that looks like it was recorded from the television. I had intended to buy all of the Durango Kid dvd,s, but after seeing the very , very, poor transfer from whatever to dvd , I have cancelled the rest from my wish list.
This package is one of the best I have bought.  The images are as clear as possible considering the time it was recorded.  The sound is good too.

Amazon delivered on time and the content is what I expected and beyond. As a kid, I used to go to the movies on Saturday afternoon and often the feature was the Durango Kid. Typical grade B movies from Republic Films, but brings back great memories of a happy childhood.
FUN STUFF HERE-NOT GREAT ACTING BUT YOU DON'T EXPECT THAT IN THESE WEAK PLOTTED FUN WESTERNS. PICTURE QUALITY EXCELLENT.
Wonderful series, excellent messages to the viewers :America nation of freedom and self determination. Combat:a special series  I will never forget .OW.

Not only is this a great movie, how they duplicated it to produce what appears to be a modern flick is beyond me.  Can't say enough - delivery is fast, prices are more than fair, quality is superb.  Takes me back to my youthful days at the theatre.
